entry.content:
Hi,

I build and test the accessibility of websites, except clearly I have yet to prove that here o_O.

Me

I became somewhat obsessed with semantic HTML, and with CSS, starting in 2001 and that obsession only got worse when I read Designing with Web Standards by Jeffrey Zeldman in 2003. Hungry for more I moved on to Web Standards Solutions by Dan Cederholm in 2004, and CSS: The Definitive Guide by Eric Meyer. I was hookedâ€¦

I often listen to web pages, and usually hate the br tag.

Alan Bristow
